DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerance M2ES TC regimen advance NSCLC .
DOC.brief_title: Study M2ES With Paclitaxel/Carboplatin ( TC Regimen ) Advanced Non Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 1870 year old ; 2 . Patients Ⅲ/Ⅳ NSCLC confirm histopathology cytology ware naive previous chemotherapy without TC regimen ; 3 . No contraindication chemotherapy ; 4 . ECOG performance scale 02 ; 5 . No history antiangiogenesis therapy ; 6 . Patients voluntary participate sigh inform content . 1 . Concurrent use anticancer agent ; 2 . Allergic history M2ES biological agent ; 3 . Pregnant breastfeeding woman ; 4 . With malignancy ; 5 . With severe cardiopulmonary disease ; 6 . Uncontrolled brain metastasis patient ; 7 . Other condition regard exclusion trialists .
